info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 20 at 11:58PM CDT until May 21 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN DELAWARE...NORTHERN ADAIR AND NORTHEASTERN CHEROKEE COUNTIES... At 1158 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles northwest of Proctor, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Westville... West Siloam Springs... Watts... Oaks... Proctor... Scraper... Ballard... Natural Falls State Park... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
